opinion.opinion_text:
PER CURIAM
Affirmed. Costs to wife.Page 156

The trial court order, which modifies the parties' decree of dissolution to provide that husband is entitled to a six-week simultaneous visit with all three of the parties' children, in addition to his visitation rights as previously decreed, is affirmed. Costs to wife.Page 157
